abstract: A panel discussion on Friday at the annual College Board conference in New York suggested ways in which students might find scholarship opportunities and best position themselves to win them.
snippet: A panel discussion on Friday at the annual College Board conference in New York suggested ways in which students might find scholarship opportunities and best position themselves to win them.
lead_paragraph: "Not to quote Charlie Sheen, but we want to create a culture of winning," said Mark Kantrowitz, publisher of the financial aid Web sites finaid.org and fastweb.com on Friday morning.

headline.main: Tips on Finding and Securing Scholarships
